TopicTitle: Need some help creating a music demo

Articles.Content: i have instruments with midi compatability years of experiance writing music for projects of all sizes. but i dont have hundreds of $$$ to spend on studio software. and that is the biggest hampper towards producing a good music demo atm.
[mod]This best belongs in Off-Topic, as it is not related to the development of the game. Thank you - Radion Spaceworks[/mod]
I have software with midi compatibility and years hours of experience editing music for projects of minute size. Sorry.
